H0.text: The test tube is cold when two chemicals are mixed in it, producing an endothermic reaction that makes the tube feel cold when touched.

H1.text: The test tube is warm is what is felt when two chemicals are mixed in a test tube, the reaction is endothermic, and the test tube is touched.

H2.text: The test tube is very hot when touched, because the endothermic reaction between the two chemicals occurs in the test tube.

H3.text: The test tube is the same temperature as the air is what is felt when two chemicals are mixed in a test tube, the reaction is endothermic, and the test tube is touched.
